title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Videos and Podcasts
body: Videos and Podcasts          Paleo-Cast: A podcast series highlighting the paleontology of John Day Fossil Beds National Monument. Learn what it's like to be a paleontologist and discover with us the fascinating fossils from the Age of Mammals.         Roving Ranger: Explore the life of a park ranger at John Day Fossil Beds, learn about the significance of the monument, and discover the unique landscape and wildlife that call eastern Oregon home.         Sojourns: Escape from the daily grind and enjoy spending a few moments with the serenely beautiful landscapes and wildlife of John Day Fossil Beds National Monument.
